title: U-shaped stereoscopic design strategy toward N-doped nanographene segment
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11771-11774
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00788C, Paper

Dongyang Zhang, Fengyuan Zhang, Hanyun Du, Fei Liu, Xiaohui Yi, Jun Chen, Ben-Lin Hu
Through a stereoscopic design strategy, U-shaped N-heteroacene was synthesized, and shows regular and incompletely closed pores within the crystal structure.
